trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rótulo de texto do elemento associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy" /> if either is set; otherwise this method returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> ou de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy" /> se algum deles estiver definido; caso contrário, esse método retornará uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nome pode ser pensada como a cadeia de caracteres de texto que um usuário deseja usar para explicar o que controle se refere.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: É importante ter uma representação textual para todos os controles de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] para que você pode consultar programaticamente o controle de maneira localizada.
